statements: SELECT vendor_id, name, email, phone_number FROM vendor_contacts;
SELECT name, email FROM vendor_contacts WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM vendor_contacts WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT name FROM vendor_contacts ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_vendors FROM vendor_contacts;
SELECT * FROM vendor_contacts WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM vendor_contacts WHERE email LIKE '%@company.com';
SELECT * FROM vendor_contacts ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM vendor_contacts WHERE vendor_id > 2 ORDER BY phone_number ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_vendors, email FROM vendor_contacts GROUP BY email HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, email_address FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE vendor_id = 2 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, phone_number FROM vendors WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, phone_number FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, email_address FROM vendors WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT p.product_name, v.vendor_name FROM products p INNER JOIN vendors v ON p.vendor_id = v.vendor_id;
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM vendors JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id = products.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name;
SELECT DISTINCT vendor_name FROM vendors ORDER BY email_address DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 100;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, vendor_phone FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, email_address FROM vendors JOIN vendor_emails ON vendors.vendor_id = vendor_emails.vendor_id;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 3;
SELECT vendor_name, v.vendor_phone AS phone_number FROM vendors v JOIN vendor_phones p ON v.vendor_id = p.vendor_id;

SELECT v.vendor_name, e.email_address, p.phone_number FROM vendors v INNER JOIN vendor_emails e ON v.vendor_id = e.vendor_id INNER JOIN vendor_phones p ON v.vendor_id = p.vendor_id WHERE v.vendor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM vendor_contacts;
SELECT name, email FROM vendor_contacts WHERE id = '1234-5678';
SELECT * FROM vendor_addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT vendor_id, note FROM vendor_notes ORDER BY vendor_id DESC;
SELECT id, tag FROM vendor_tags WHERE tag = 'high_priority' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM vendor_contacts;
SELECT name, email FROM vendor_contacts WHERE phone_number='1234567890';
SELECT note FROM vendor_notes WHERE vendor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

SELECT vendor_contacts.name, vendor_addresses.city, vendor_tags.tag FROM vendor_contacts JOIN vendor_addresses ON vendor_contacts.id = vendor_addresses.vendor_id JOIN vendor_tags ON vendor_contacts.id = vendor_tags.vendor_id;
SELECT * FROM vendor_notes WHERE note LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT name, email FROM vendors ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT v.name, vc.contact_name FROM vendors v JOIN vendor_contacts vc ON v.id = vc.vendor_id;
SELECT va.address_line1, va.city, va.state FROM vendor_addresses va WHERE va.zip_code='12345';
SELECT vc.category_name, v.name FROM vendor_categories vc JOIN vendor_category_mapping vcm ON vc.id = vcm.category_id JOIN vendors v ON vcm.vendor_id = v.id;
SELECT v.name, vc.contact_name, va.address_line1 FROM vendors v JOIN vendor_contacts vc ON v.id = vc.vendor_id JOIN vendor_addresses va ON v.id = va.vendor_id
SELECT v.name, v.email, vc.contact_email, va.city FROM vendors v JOIN vendor_contacts vc ON v.id = vc.vendor_id JOIN vendor_addresses va ON v.id = va.vendor_id
SELECT v.name, vc.contact_name, va.city, vc.contact_phone FROM vendors v JOIN vendor_contacts vc ON v.id = vc.vendor_id JOIN vendor_addresses va ON v.id = va.vendor_id
SELECT v.name, vc.contact_email, va.state FROM vendors v JOIN vendor_addresses va ON v.id = va.vendor_id JOIN vendor_contacts vc ON v.id = vc.vendor_id
SELECT v.id, v.name, vc.contact_name, va.state, vc.contact_email FROM vendors v JOIN vendor_contacts vc ON v.id = vc.vendor_id JOIN vendor_addresses va ON v.id = va.vendor_id
